name: Hotaru Lake
description:
A small snippet of the environment created for the third-year professional project at Abertay University.  Hotaru is a fantasy exploration game following Mush's journey to return light to the world. 

I uploaded this build to allow the viewer to experience the underwater lake by themselves. I hope whoever views this can enjoy my Lily Lake. 

Music by @Harryfdub
Character by @dragonsweyr
Animations by Helena
